name: Barbarian+
overview: Barbarian+ is a remake of the 30+year-old C64/Amiga classic Barbarian (also known as Death Sword in America) from the mid to late ’80s and most of the game is identical to the original although there are a few surprises here and there. The game features the fun two-player Versus mode that made the game so popular in the first place, fighting a friend with a sword and being able to cut his head off nearly beat that you should press that “T” button thing in IK+.
